alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 11:57AM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Broward and south central Palm Beach Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1157 AM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, or 12 miles west of Coral Springs, moving northwest at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Loxahatchee NWR. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Inland Palm Beach County
